name: Sample Project
description: A web app for transcripts that were automatically generated from speech-to-text software

controls.label: Play/Pause
controls.keyDescription: Hold shift and press space bar to play, pause, or re-play a line

controls.label: Submit & Continue
controls.keyDescription: Press enter key to submit current line and continue

controls.label: Prev Line
controls.keyDescription: Press up arrow key to go to previous line

controls.label: Next Line
controls.keyDescription: Press down arrow key to go to next line

controls.label: Prev Word
controls.keyDescription: Hold shift and press left arrow key to move to previous word

controls.label: Next Word
controls.keyDescription: Hold shift and press right arrow key to move to next word
